snippet: President Obama revealed a long list of gripes in a nearly 50-minute news conference that ranged from a recalcitrant Congress that is refusing to deliver the emergency border funding bill he requested to a press corps that neglected to wish him a...
abstract: White House Memo; Pres Obama expresses frustration over gridlock on a number of domestic and foreign issues during 50-minute news conference; his comments during 50-minute question-and-answer session display his growing second-term fatigue and disillusionment.
lead_paragraph: President Obama revealed a long list of gripes in a nearly 50-minute news conference that ranged from a recalcitrant Congress that is refusing to deliver the emergency border funding bill he requested to a press corps that neglected to wish him a happy birthday.

headline.main: After Heated Week, President Blows Off Steam
headline.print_headline: After Heated Week, President Blows Off Steam
